smarty.config module¶

Smarty’s configuration.

class smarty.config.Config[source]¶

Bases: object

Smarty config

Variables:

  • VERBOSE (bool) – model’s verbosity

  • _AUTO_DETECTION (bool) – enables/disables smarty.datasets.datasets.DataSet auto dtype detection, preferable not to change by set param but by smarty.datasets.datasets.DataSet.dummy_writer

smarty.config.config = <smarty.config.Config object>¶

Accuall smarty.config.Config() object that holds liblary configuration (note: after program’s execution any changes are gone).

Note

It is not reccommended to change the config directly.

smarty.config.get_config(key)[source]¶

Get smarty.config.config property

Parameters:

key (str) – smarty.config.Config() class var

Raises:

AssertionError if provided key is not smarty.config.Config var

smarty.config.set_config(key, val)[source]¶

Set smarty.config.config property

Parameters:

  • key (str) – smarty.config.Config() class var

  • val – new value for smarty.config.config.key

Raises:

AssertionError if provided key’s val is in wrong dtype or if provided key is not smarty.config.Config var

smarty.config.temp_config = <smarty.config.ConfigOff object>¶

Allows to temporarily change the config with auto-restore to previous option, ex:

1from smarty.config import temp_config
2
3with temp_config(VERBOSE=False):
4    model.predict(test_ds)
